description: Chess is a two-player strategy board game played on a checkered board with 64 squares arranged in an 8Ã—8 square grid.

Chapteh is a traditional Asian game which requires players to keep a weighted shuttlecock in the air, usually using their feet, although other parts of the body may also be used, except for the hands.

Gasing is a term that refers to both the Malay spinning top and the game of top spinning. Gasing was a popular game played in the kampongs of Singapore and Malaysia, especially among members of the Malay community.

Also known as kelereng or guli, Goli is a game played with marbles. Made of either glass, clay, limestone, or plastic, the marbles are used to hit another players' marbles in an attempt to claim them.
